review: I am a manufacturer of wooden toilet seats.  Until I saw this report, I had no idea that China was even a viable market.  I am so pleased that I now know that through 2014 the outlook for wooden toilet seats are good for China and thus I shall send them to the Chinese people (who, in a stroke of coincidence, actually made them!)Wooden toilet seats: Good for China, good for you.
productTitle: The 2009-2014 Outlook for Wood Toilet Seats in Greater China
